## Applying to PhD programs in psychology

-   "How applying to graduate school works" - the Sokol-Hessner Lab <a href="https://www.sokolhessnerlab.com/howapplyingworks" class="fa-solid fa-arrow-up-right-from-square" target="_blank" style="text-decoration:none" ></a>

-   "Mitch's Uncensored Advice for Applying to Graduate School in Clinical Psychology" - Mitch Prinstein (useful for both clinical and non-clinical programs) <a href="https://mitch.web.unc.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4922/2017/02/MitchGradSchoolAdvice.pdf" class="fa-solid fa-arrow-up-right-from-square" target="_blank" style="text-decoration:none" ></a>
-   Temple University's Doctoral Program in Psychology & Neuroscience <a href="https://www.temple.edu/academics/degree-programs/psychology-phd-la-psy-phd" class="fa-solid fa-arrow-up-right-from-square" target="_blank" style="text-decoration:none" ></a>
-   Application Statement Feedback Program <a href="https://www.asfp.io/" class="fa-solid fa-arrow-up-right-from-square" target="_blank" style="text-decoration:none" ></a>
